title.bibl: Dziennik Chicagoski, Apr. 7, 1894. Polish Society to Participate in Polish Mass Meeting

div.bibl: Dziennik Chicagoski, Apr. 7, 1894. POLISH SOCIETY TO PARTICIPATE IN POLISH MASS MEETING

body.p: We have received the following communication:

"We wish to announce that the St. Peter and Paul Society of St. Stanislaus Kostka Parish decided at its last meeting to take active part in the planned Polish mass meeting in Chicago. The Society in question has already chosen Carol Armgardt and Jacob Jakobowski as its delegates.
